metadata.title: CVE-2015-5292 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Memory leak in the Privilege Attribute Certificate (PAC) responder plugin(sssd_pac_plugin.so) in System Security Services Daemon (SSSD) 1.10 before1.13.1 allows remote authenticated users to cause a denial of service(memory consumption) via a large number of logins that trigger parsing ofPAC blobs during Kerberos authentication.

criterions.comment: sssd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
